title: Twisted Tales of Bruce Jones (01 - 04)
description:
Twisted Tales of Bruce Jones (01 - 04)(1986)

Published by Eclipse Comics in 1986, The Twisted Tales of Bruce Jones was a four-issue limited series highlighting the storytelling skills of American artist and novelist Bruce Jones. The series was originally slated for publication by Pacific Comics, but the company went bankrupt, and Eclipse picked it up.

The series is an anthology of Jones' fantasy and science fiction work, and is intended for mature readers.
